title: Imaginary Conversations
description: binding: natural linen, design stamped in brown; gold-stamped lettering/border; endpapers: white wove; slip case: dark brown paper over cardboard, dust jacket of beige laid paper, lettering and designs stamped in brown; deckle-edged, two; type: Monotype Fontana; 320 pp.
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy Millett Lindeke
